  • About me

I am Md. Mahafuzur Rahaman. My journy in web design & development start from 2014. Every day I am learning new things, and try to use this in a real project. I am working heard to saticefy my client, for this reasone I give my maximum effort in a project to create new awsome things.

This site was created for who want to learn web design and development. It is created with the help of jekyl because it free to host in github, and also this is bloging aweare.

You can find all of my work in portfolio section, and go to home page to find more cool stuff.
